column4: can any one help me/ throw some ideas about my wifi? i can see the network i whant to conect to i just cant. also i cant fing my wifi card in the hardware folder. if you need more info just ask.
What does sudo iwlist scan   say?  Should show you wifi networks in range.
i dont know im new to ubuntu. what do i do?
Open a terminal and type "sudo iwlist scan" without quotes.
sudo - escalates you to root, iwlist - command line wifi utility, scan - look for wireless networks.
ok i got that what now
Did your wifi networks show up?
yes a wifi network showed up
And they show up in the little applet thing on the panel as well?  What happens when you try to connect using the applet?
The fact that wifi networks are showing is a very good sign :)
it trys to connect i can get on the internet for 30 seconds while its trying to conect but the is sais that its diconected
I'm researching.  hold tight :)
thank you
try this: sudo iwconfig wlan0 <yourESSID>
You still there?
yes i am but essid wasnt exepted
you're typing it right?  Copy / paste exactly what you tried.
i did. i copyed and pasted: sudo iwconfig wlan0 <yourESSID>
Hmm, I'm not sure, you do need, sudo iwconfig wlan0 essid <essidName>
Understand??
essid and then the actual name
If you'd like to dive real deep please PM me :)
